ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectIssuance of Certificate GC-117 and Amending Order AO-1-GC-108 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate GC-108)
PrecisOrder approving the issuance by the National Energy Board of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. GC-117 to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. and Amending Order AO-1-GC-108 to Encana Corporation for the Horn River pipeline project.
